price: 134. Waxa la idiinku gooddiyo waa imaan, (Allena) kama fakan kartaan.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
